packageRepo.readme:
# English Greetings

It's the thought that counts, not the typing ;-)

## Other useful/noteworthy Espanso packages

- [effective-markdown](https://github.com/katrinleinweber/espanso-effective-markdown)
- [greetings-german](https://github.com/espanso/hub/tree/main/packages/greetings-german/0.2.0)

## Espansions

Trigger | Replace
-- | --
`,dt` | `Dear {{clipboard}} team,`
`,dms` | `Dear Madam or Sir,`
`,kr` | `Kind regards,`
`!gw` | `and have a good week!`
`!sw` | `and have a good start into the new week!`
`!we` | `and have a nice weekend!`
`!rw` | `and have a nice rest of the week!`
`,tk` | `Thank you & kind regards,`
`!ty` | `Thank you$|$!`
`:yw` | `You're welcome $|$:-)`
`&tf` | `& thanks for the feedback `
`&tm` | `& thanks for merging `

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
global_vars:
  - name: "clipboard"
    type: "clipboard"

matches:

  - trigger: ",dt"
    replace: "Dear {{clipboard}} team,\n\n\n"

  - trigger: ",dms"
    replace: "Dear Madam or Sir,\n\n\n"

  - trigger: ",kr"
    replace: "Kind regards,"

  - trigger: "!gw"
    replace: "and have a good week!"

  - trigger: "!sw"
    replace: "and have a good start into the new week!"

  - trigger: "!we"
    replace: "and have a nice weekend!"

  - trigger: "!rw"
    replace: "and have a nice rest of the week!"

  - trigger: ",tk"
    replace: "Thank you & kind regards,"

  - trigger: "!ty"
    replace: "Thank you$|$!"

  - trigger: ":yw"
    replace: "You're welcome $|$:-)"

  - trigger: "&tf"
    replace: "& thanks for the feedback "

  - trigger: "&tm"
    replace: "& thanks for merging "
